doc.name: MapFileStorage
doc.description: A DE actor that stores data from a MapWorker and distributes it to a ReduceWorker, upon request from the reduce worker.
doc.author: Adam Cataldo
doc.port: The inputTrigger port. The type of this port is undeclared, meaning that it will resolve to any data type.
The inputTrigger port. The type of this port is undeclared, meaning that it will resolve to any data type.

The output port. The type of this port is unspecified. Derived classes may set it.
The output port. The type of this port is unspecified. Derived classes may set it.
doc.property: The number of output actors to write to. This parameter contains an IntToken, initially with value 1. The value must be greater than zero.
